name: Novi Management
overview: Novi Management A/S, Prior to Change in Line of Business was a venture capital firm specializing in seed and start-up and early stage companies. The firm provides investment for developing research institutions’ patents with a subsequent sale typically to large international industrial players. It provides investment capital and premises for high-tech companies with an international potential. Novi Management A/S, Prior to Change in Line of Business was founded in 1989 and is based in Aalborg East, Denmark with an additional office in Kobenhavn K, Denmark.

funding_round.source_description: Borean Pharma raises Euros 4 Million in series A fundraising
